mapper.insert: insert into myPlace(mno, userid, mcategory, title, content) values (myPlace_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{mcategory}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select mno, mcategory, title, userid, content, regdate, updatedate from myPlace where mno>0 order by mno desc, regdate desc
select mno, mcategory, title, userid, content from myplace where mno = #{mno}
